content:
Prospero Directory Service

  • Prospero Directory Service

    • Light weight data access (UDP Based)
    • Layered Semantics

      • Simple data model for repository
    • Services available to applications

      • Indexing, Replication, Distribution, Garbage Collection
      • Object Identification
      • Providing these services not dependent on data semantics
    • Attributes define semantics for applications and provide meta-data for middleware services
